heroDescription: Dive into a vibrant universe where fans of comics, movies, TV series, video games, and anime meet. It's the annual meeting to meet celebrities, attend exclusive panels and creative workshops, and discover the work of artists and authors. Whether you're in cosplay or just curious, come share your passion and create unforgettable memories.
footerThemes: Pop culture, video games, manga/anime, comics
footerGroup: Group 10 (A1-B1): Pierrick Bapicot, Mathéo Bonnet, Damien Bretteville, Alexis Colas, Noa Leenknegt
footerCopyright: © 2025 Belfort POP Con. All rights reserved.
